exp_summary.text:

prof_summary.title: Professional Summary
summary: Experience PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS & Golang
Solid understanding of object-oriented programming
Good understanding of REST APIs, cron jobs and schedulers
Good understanding of front-end technologies
Familiarity with concepts of ORM, and Restful
Tend to  writing clean, easy readable and reusable code
Ability to integrate multiple data sources and databases into one system
Understanding of fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
Able to create database schemas that represent and support business processes
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools
Familiarity with continuous integration
Familiar with Redis, Git, GCP, AWS, Heroku, NATS, Datadog, rollbar etc
